name: Black Hole (itch) (FrankyBoi14)
description:
Orbit around a black hole and take pictures of it! Avoid the asteroids by slowing down and speeding up at the right places. If you get hit, you'll lose some pictures!

ControlsActionRight arrow key (in game)Orbit black holeLeft/Right arrow key (menu)SelectSpace (menu)ConfirmBackspace (menu)Back to main menu

Programming and Art by FrankyBoi14.

SFX by Trix

Made for the Nokia 3310 5 Jam.

Enjoy!
